channel.title: young designer of the year – ANKIT DARDA

item.title: Upcycled: Railways Heritage Park | My Museum 1+1 online contest
item.dc:creator: ankitdarda
item.description: TELL A FAVORITE MUSEUM IN 1 IMAGE AND 1 PHRASE ONLINE CONTEST! After honored with Young Designer of the Year 2014 Special Mention Award, Railways Heritage Park is once again among Online Contestant for Museum Category. “Upcycled: Railways Heritage Park“ is among the Inexhibit.com My-Museum |1+1| online entries and needs your voting support to win this exciting contest. Please Register at […]
item.content:encoded:
TELL A FAVORITE MUSEUM IN 1 IMAGE AND 1 PHRASE ONLINE CONTEST! After honored with Young Designer of the Year 2014 Special Mention Award, Railways Heritage Park is once again among Online Contestant for Museum Category. “Upcycled: Railways Heritage Park“ is among the Inexhibit.com My-Museum |1+1| online entries and needs your voting support to win this exciting contest. Please Register at Inexhibit.com and vote until September 5.

Inexhibit.com has recently announced the online contest to promote permanent/temporary museums online across the world. The “perfect combination” of an image and a sentence capable together to depict the museum that you like most will win exciting prices. The My-Museum |1+1| is an online contest open to graphic designers, creative people, poets, writers, photographers, architects, designers, students, artists, art enthusiasts and passionate travellers.

Deadline for public voting: 5 September 2014 | No Entry Fee | The contest’s winner will receive a money prize of 400,00 USD. The Top 10 proposals will receive also a Certificate of merit.

Check out their Homepage for more information.

According to Bridge Payday, Financial mistakes happen anytime. Learn more about how a bridge loan works, and what the benefits of a bridge loan are.

Thank you for your support!

item.title: Young Designer of the Year 2014
item.dc:creator: ankitdarda
item.description: Recently, our executed project Railways Heritage park got special mention for the young designer of the year 2014 competition under urban design category organized by the leading architecture and design magazine Indian Architects and Builders at Mumbai followed by the 361 degrees conference and soon the project is going to publish in their upcoming architecture issue. […]
item.content:encoded:
Recently, our executed project Railways Heritage park got special mention for the young designer of the year 2014 competition under urban design category organized by the leading architecture and design magazine Indian Architects and Builders at Mumbai followed by the 361 degrees conference and soon the project is going to publish in their upcoming architecture issue. The special mention entry can be seen here.

The park had been executed and inaugurated for the completion of 150 years of Narrow-Gauge Railways history in Vadodara region. Followed by the SAARC Railway Convention with different competition and exhibition from the local artists and enthusiasts. It was an collaborative accomplishment by the interdisciplinary professionals from varied design and non-design background like architects, landscape architect, industrial designers, engineers, museology and historical PhD students. Speaking of landscape architects, if you’re planning to renovate your backyard, visit brandon foster tulsa and owasso website to read some of the best tips in landscaping. Visit this website https://www.adinfusion.com/branding-design/ and learn more. Railway Heritage Park is archetype of the successful adaptive reuse and recycling of the railways junk into a prosperous  heritage platform for railway enthusiasts, passengers, local residents and region itself. Further detail can be reviewed here.
